title: Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
We’re looking for a reliable Virtual Assistant to help with basic, recurring tasks inside GoHighLevel.
No deep tech skills required – we’ll train you step by step.

Typical tasks include:
– Copy/pasting content
– Duplicating funnels and workflows
– Updating texts, links, or images
– Checking if automations work properly
– Organizing client accounts

To apply, please send us:
? A short confirmation that your internet connection is stable
? One example of a similar task you’ve done before
? One sentence on why you consider yourself detail-oriented

English doesn’t need to be perfect – we care about clarity, speed and reliability.
This is a long-term opportunity for the right person.

Send application to Upgrade to see actual info
